p: 9,232 HIV pol sequences were retrieved from the SHCS DRDB. The SHCS DRDB aggregates all HIV resistance tests for patients of the SHCS. SmartGene is responsible for data storage and management ( http://www.smartgene.com). The DRDB is part of the SHCS, which is an ongoing national clinical cohort of HIV patients aged 16 and above with biannual follow up ( http://www.shcs.ch) 20. Sequences were assigned subtypes using REGA 30 31; subtypes B (91%), A1 (5%), and C (5%) were analysed. The SHCS has been approved by the ethics committees of all participating institutions, and written, informed consent has been obtained from participants.
